question: Which organisation has released the ‘2020 State of Climate Services’ report?
explanation:
The 2020 State of Climate Services report has been released by the World Meteorological Organisation (WMO) along with 16 international agencies and financing institutions.
The WMO revealed that more disasters attributed to weather are taking place every year. It also warned that the number of people who need international humanitarian help could rise by 50 per cent by 2030 when compared to 2018.
